summary: An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.
cast: Ranveer Singh|Deepika Padukone|Priyanka Chopra|Tanvi Azmi|Mahesh Manjrekar|Raza Murad|Aditya Pancholi|Milind Soman|Vaibhav Tatwawaadi|Yatin Karyekar|Benjamin Gilani|Zila Khan|Ganesh Yadav|Sukhada Khandkekar|Anuja Sathe|Swarali Marathe|Snehalata Vasaikar|Amol Bavdekar|Ayush Tandon|Sachin Rawal|Shabbir Ali|Karrtik Ahuja|Tejashree Manohar Dharne|Mrunmayi Arun Supal|Vivek Ghamande|Rudra Soni|Jason D'Souza|Naeem Khan|Rajeev Mishra|Vijay Andalkar|Yashwant Wasnik|Altamash|Tanvir|Musheer Khan|Saba Shaikh|Ranjeet Kaur Saini|Preeti Shaikh|Shifa|Munna|Varad|Anil Karndikar|Vikramjeet S. Sandhu|Arvinder Gill|Yash Gawli|Irrfan Khan
title: Bajirao Mastani
